message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the item. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to both of us. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $10,500.
